content.text: So over the past bit I've decided that I needed to fix my portfolio site as it wasn't responsive at all and it was really bugging me. Recently, I've used Semantic UI alot with React and it's been really nice using their Grid system which works really nicely with making pages responsive and what not so I applied it to this site (which was previously using bootstrap).

I use bootstrap alot at work and while I know how to get stuff done with it I find it alot easier and nicer to work with semantic's grid system instead. Anyways, that's all I've added for now. I've been working on a webGL multiplayer game lately so stay tuned for that post and I'll add it to the projects page as well.
